spells.name: Antimagic Field
spells.description: Negates magic within 10 ft.

spells.name: Dispel Magic, Greater
spells.description: As dispel magic, but with multiple targets.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spells.description: As lesser globe of invulnerability, plus 4th-level spell effects.

spells.name: Guards and Wards
spells.description: Array of magic effects protect area.

spells.name: Repulsion
spells.description: Creatures can't approach you.

spells.name: Acid Fog
spells.description: Fog deals acid damage.

spells.name: Planar Binding
spells.description: As lesser planar binding, but up to 12 HD.

spells.name: Summon Monster VI
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Wall of Iron
spells.description: 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

spells.name: Analyze Dweomer
spells.description: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

spells.name: Legend Lore
spells.description: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

spells.name: Geas/Quest
spells.description: As lesser geas, but affects any creature.

spells.name: Heroism, Greater
spells.description: Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

spells.name: Suggestion, Mass
spells.description: As suggestion, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Symbol of Persuasion
spells.description: Triggered rune charms creatures.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.description: 1d6/level damage and 1 secondary bolt/level.

spells.name: Contingency
spells.description: Sets trigger condition for another spell.

spells.name: Forceful Hand
spells.description: Hand pushes creatures away.

spells.name: Freezing Sphere
spells.description: Freezes water or deals cold damage.

spells.name: Mislead
spells.description: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

spells.name: Permanent Image
spells.description: Permanent illusion, includes sight, sound, smell, and thermal effects.

spells.name: Programmed Image
spells.description: As major image, but triggered by event.

spells.name: Shadow Walk
spells.description: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

spells.name: Veil
spells.description: Changes appearance of a group of creatures.

spells.name: Circle of Death
spells.description: Kills 1d4/level HD of creatures.

spells.name: Create Undead
spells.description: Raises ghouls, ghasts, mummies, or mohrgs from physical remains.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.description: Target becomes panicked, sickened, and comatose.

spells.name: Symbol of Fear
spells.description: Triggered rune panics nearby creatures.

spells.name: Undeath to Death
spells.description: Destroys 1d4/level HD of undead (max. 20d4).

spells.name: Bear's Endurance, Mass
spells.description: As bear's endurance, affects one subject/level.

spells.name: Beast Shape IV
spells.description: You take the form of a Diminutive to Huge animal or a Tiny to Large magical beast.

spells.name: Bull's Strength, Mass
spells.description: As bull's strength, affects 1 subject per level.

spells.name: Cat's Grace, Mass
spells.description: As cat's grace, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Control Water
spells.description: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description: Reduces one creature or object to dust.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
spells.description: As eagle's splendor, 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Elemental Body III
spells.description: Turns you into a Large elemental.

spells.name: Flesh to Stone
spells.description: Turns subject creature into statue.

spells.name: Form of the Dragon I
spells.description: Turns you into a Medium dragon.

spells.name: Fox's Cunning, Mass
spells.description: As fox's cunning, affects 1 subject/ level.

spells.name: Mage's Lucubration
spells.description: Wizard only. Recalls spell of 5th level or lower.

spells.name: Move Earth
spells.description: Digs trenches and builds hills.

spells.name: Owl's Wisdom, Mass
spells.description: As owl's wisdom, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Plant Shape II
spells.description: Turns you into a Large plant creature.

spells.name: Stone to Flesh
spells.description: Restores petrified creature.

spells.name: Transformation
spells.description: You gain combat bonuses.
